lead_paragraph: The W.B.O. world heavyweight champion Sergei Liakhovich will give away 30 pounds to the challenger Shannon Briggs when he defends his title tomorrow night against Briggs at Chase Field in Phoenix. But that is all Liakhovich, who weighed in at 238 pounds yesterday, planned to give away. “I know he is going to come out swinging, and I know he is going to try and throw a lot of hard punches,” Liakhovich said. “But he needs to think about every time he swings, he is going to get hit.” It will be the first defense for the 30-year-old Liakhovich, a native of Belarus who lives in Scottsdale, Ariz.
